text: avar paṟayunnu: "ī kālikaḷuṭe vayaṟukaḷiluḷḷat ñaṅṅaḷile āṇuṅṅaḷkk mātramuḷḷatāṇ. ñaṅṅaḷuṭe bhāryamārkk at niṣid'dhamāṇ.” ennāl at śavamāṇeṅkil avarellāṁ atil paṅkāḷikaḷākuṁ. tīrccayāyuṁ avaruṭe ī keṭṭiccamakkalukaḷkk allāhu anuyēājyamāya pratiphalaṁ vaikāte nalkuṁ. sanśayamilla; avan yuktimānuṁ ellāṁ aṟiyunnavanumāṇ
